item.title: Week 33: Landing
item.description: The first week back at work is fairly quiet, I even found myself on the verge of boredom at one point. Organically, this makes me feel bad, but I remind myself that weeks before and after holidays tend to have this effect on my life. I tell myself I’m just landing. No one can convince me the municipality of Amsterdam isnâ€™t using major construction projects to show tourists how crap the city can be.
